question: What is the purpose of using ComfyUI-Latte?
answer: The purpose of using ComfyUI-Latte is to facilitate the generation of text-to-video content using the [a/latte](https://github.com/Vchitect/Latte) tool.

question: Can ComfyUI-Latte be used for generating videos from text?
answer: Yes, ComfyUI-Latte allows for text-to-video generation using the [a/latte](https://github.com/Vchitect/Latte) tool.

answer: Text-to-video generation in ComfyUI-Latte is implemented using the [a/latte](https://github.com/Vchitect/Latte) tool.

answer: ComfyUI-Latte is integrated with a/latte to enable text-to-video generation capabilities.
